Devin Truong

Fly/IM

Junior

Great Falls, Va.

Hometown

Biography

Summary

Biography

Performance History

2019-20: Recorded two individual first-place, two individual second-place and one individual third-place finish during the season…Placed 11th in the 100-yard butterfly (49.13) and in the preliminaries, placed 10th in the 200-yard butterfly (1:50.17) and 24th in the 200-yard IM (1:52.29), all season-best times, and was a member of the gold-medal winning 200-yard medley relay team that set a program record (1:27.20) at the 2020 Atlantic 10 Championships held at the SPIRE Institute in Geneva, Ohio Feb. 19-22…Placed seventh in the 200-yard IM (1:56.69), eighth in the 200-yard freestyle (1:46.70) and 11th in the 50-yard freestyle (22.39) vs. American, Army and Old Dominion Jan. 25…Made the podium with a second-place finish in the 100-yard butterfly (50.24) and was fourth in the 200-yard butterfly (1:54.42) vs. UMBC Jan. 18…Placed sixth in the 200-yard IM (1:53.44), 20th in the 100-yard backstroke (52.69) and 37th in the 200-yard butterfly (1:57.91) at the Patriot Invitational Nov.21-23…Took the top spot on the podium in the 100-yard butterfly (50.43) and placed fourth in the 200-yard butterfly (1:55.04) vs. La Salle at the Atlantic 10 Classic Nov. 2-3…Made the podium in all three of his events, winning both the 50-yard butterfly (23.12) and 200-yard butterfly (1:54.08) while placing second in the 200-yard IM (1:58.35) vs. Davidson at the Richmond Duals Oct. 18-19…Began the second with a second-place finish in the 100-yard butterfly (52.50) and a fourth-place finish in the 200-yard butterfly (1:57.78) at Delaware Oct. 5.

2018-19: Recorded one individual third place finish during the season…Made the podium with a third place finish in the 100-yard butterfly (48.65) and also placed sixth in the 200-yard butterfly (1:48.66), both personal-best times, at the 2019 Atlantic 10 Championships Feb. 20-23.

2017-18: Recorded two individual first place, four individual second place and two individual third place finishes during the season…Placed second in both the 200-yard butterfly (1:59.86) and 200-yard IM (1:54.66) Jan. 26-27 at Liberty and VMI…Finished 19th in the 100-yard butterfly (51.10), 25th in the 100-yard breaststroke (1:00.26), 31st in the 200-yard butterfly (1:57.80) and 36th in the 200-yard IM (1:58.08) Nov. 16-18 at the Patriot Invitational…Swam in three events at the Atlantic 10 Classic Oct. 28-29, finishing fourth in the 100-yard butterfly (51.13), seventh in the 200-yard butterfly (1:55.83) and 10th in the 100-yard IM (56.92)…Made the podium three times at the Richmond Duals Oct. 20-21, finishing first in the 50-yard butterfly (23.11), second in the 100-yard butterfly (50.89) and third in the 200-yard butterfly (1:55.10), while placing fourth in the 200-yard IM (1:56.87)…Began the season with a second place finish in the 100-yard butterfly (50.94) and a third place finish in the 200-yard butterfly (1:56.38) Oct. 14 at Delaware.

Prep: Four-year swimming letterwinner at Langley High School…Team captain…Helped the Saxons to three conference championships…2016 Regional Champion High School team…Was a member of the All-American 200-yard medley relay team and 2016 state runner-up…All-Conference as a freshman…Math Honor Society…Science Honor Society.

Personal: Son of Diane and Matt…Hobbies include fishing and video games…Also recruited by Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute…Electrical Engineering major.
